definition: to quote/to cite/to recommend/to appoint/(computing) reference

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The report cited several societal and economic reasons for the jump.
sentences.chinese: 該報告引用了一些社會和經濟原因解釋這一跨越。

sentences.english: They define an "excellent paper" as one that is highly cited by other researchers.
sentences.chinese: 他們把“優秀論文”定義爲引用量高的文章。

sentences.english: And to accept that - to quote him - "it shoots, it hits".
sentences.chinese: 引用作者的話，便是，箭在射，箭打中了靶心。

sentences.english: Sixth, citation studies are highly field-sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 第六，引用研究對領域具有高度敏感性。

sentences.english: In both functions, you obtain a reference to the application that you specify.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個函數都可獲得對指定應用程序的引用。

sentences.english: Incorporate quotations of three lines or less into the text, within single quotation marks.
sentences.chinese: 文本中三行或更少的合併的引用語，用單引號。

sentences.english: We can also refer to external encrypted data or encrypted keys.
sentences.chinese: 我們也可以引用外部加密數據或加密密鑰。

sentences.english: You don't have to bite my head off. I'm just quoting Julia.
sentences.chinese: 你不需要衝我發火，我不過是在引用朱莉婭的話。

sentences.english: The following section refer to scholars Li Chongfu recent article.
sentences.chinese: 下面引用學者李崇富最近的一段文章。

sentences.english: This code can be followed by a reference to a specific account.
sentences.chinese: 這個代碼後面可以跟一個對一個特定賬戶的引用。

sentences.english: You may quote me on that.
sentences.chinese: 你們可以引用我這句話。

sentences.english: The latest edition of the citated document without date fit this standard.
sentences.chinese: 凡是不注日期的引用文件，最新版本適用於本標準。

sentences.english: Do the process instructions reference available visual aids?
sentences.chinese: 工序說明引用了有效的視覺教具了嗎？

sentences.english: The company cited the development of advanced design software and advanced production equipment.
sentences.chinese: 公司引用先進的開發設計軟件和先進的生產設備。

sentences.english: More to the question of man's competitiveness: let me give a further quote.
sentences.chinese: 爲進一步說明人類的競爭天性，我再引用些東西。

sentences.english: Do not send a copy of the review to the application that references the DMF.
sentences.chinese: 不要向引用DMF的申請方發送一份審覈文件。

definition: marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
to cite/to quote/to cite as evidence
source (esp. of quotation or literary allusion)/origin/where sth comes from
